Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: RN Rachel H "Rachel in Florida"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. Easy to use for a beginner DSLR photographer. I am enjoying it very much and learning its nuances.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
16GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger
3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case
External Digital Slave SLR Flash + Full Size 50" Tripod W/Carry Bag + Padded Carrying Case w/Strap + Memory Card Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens LPE8 Battery / Charger Filter Kit Flash 16GB DavisMAX Bundle
